title: Connection magics settings
description: %%pyspark, %%sql, %%scalaspark and %%local are considered as Connection magics

connectionType.title: Default connection type
connectionType.description: Default connection type. Value can be one of local, pyspark, scalaspark, and sql

toDisplayConnectMagic.title: Display Connection magics
toDisplayConnectMagic.description: Show the first line of auto generated Connection cell magics

toEditConnectMagic.title: Editable Connection magics
toEditConnectMagic.description: Editable first line of auto generated Connection cell magics, when shown

alwaysShowCellLevelConnectionSelection.title: Always show the Connection cell magics
alwaysShowCellLevelConnectionSelection.description: Always show the Connection cell magics selection

alwaysUseS3StorageInVisualization.title: Always store query result in S3 for data visualization
alwaysUseS3StorageInVisualization.description: By default, all query results are stored in cell for data visualization

enableInteractiveDebugging.title: Enable interactive debugging
enableInteractiveDebugging.description: When enabled, the debugging button will be shown for interactive debugging
